post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Alpha Lab Inc. has been in the medical business for 30 years and has developed a number of medical information system during this time. Currently, we are in the process of developing an on-line distributed medical information system to be marketed as a product throughout North America. We are currently seeking 2 Client-Side Java Developers with the following qualifications:

SKILLS:
- Strong background in GUI design using Java/Swing/AWT
- Strong background in OO analysis and design
- Strong communication skills
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Demonstrated ability to work well under pressure with minimal supervision

KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE
- Minimum 3 years of Java development
- Minimum 2 years of experience with Swing/AWT
- Minimum 2 years of OO modeling experience (UML/Rational Rose)
- Minimum 1 year of experience with J2EE
- Experience with server side Java programming using JMS, EJB, Servlet/JSP
- Good working knowledge of Design Pattern
- Experience with relational databases (Oracle, SQL Server)

EDUCATION:
- University degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent experience

Please send resumes via email or fax to:

Email: alpha@alphainc.org
FAX : 416-449-2543


----------------------------------------------------------------------
Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact Information
alpha@alphainc.org
Alpha Lab Inc.
North York ON
Fax: 416 449 2543
post.title: Client-Side Java Developers
